episode_event_naturelover/4001_1001_0200: Oh? You here to catch some waves, too?
episode_event_naturelover/4001_1001_0400:
Yeah! The ocean’s big enough for everyone!
Walk-ins welcome!
episode_event_naturelover/4001_1001_0500: No, that’s not what I meant...
episode_event_naturelover/4001_1001_0700:
We’re doing a beach activity—something fun
with Pokémon!
episode_event_naturelover/4001_1001_0900:
I’m Oak—Samson Oak. I research regional
variants in Alola!
episode_event_naturelover/4001_1001_1000:
I wanted everyone on Pasio to have
something fun to do at the beach, so I
decided to host today’s event.
episode_event_naturelover/4001_1001_1100:
In fact, back in Alola, I do enjoy a bit of
Mantine Surfing myself when I’m not
researching!
episode_event_naturelover/4001_1001_1300:
It’s an Alolan sport. You ride a Mantine’s
back and surf the ocean waves!
episode_event_naturelover/4001_1001_1400:
But we don’t have the right equipment here,
so it’s not quite the real deal.
episode_event_naturelover/4001_1001_1500:
This one’s more of a trial session for
beginners!
episode_event_naturelover/4001_1001_1600:
We won’t be heading offshore, but we’ll still
have a great time catching some waves!
episode_event_naturelover/4001_1001_1700: Would you like to join us?
episode_event_naturelover/4001_1001_1900: What, Cetitan? You want me to try it out?
episode_event_naturelover/4001_1001_2000: OK, fine. But just for a little bit.
episode_event_naturelover/4002_1101_0100:
Grusha and Cetitan enjoyed themselves
at the beach.
episode_event_naturelover/4002_1001_0300:
I haven’t felt this kind of post-ride fatigue
in ages.
episode_event_naturelover/4002_1001_0500:
You were pretty good! Do you play
any sports?
episode_event_naturelover/4002_1001_0600: Yeah, I used to be a snowboarder.
episode_event_naturelover/4002_1001_0700: But now I’m a Gym Leader in Paldea.
episode_event_naturelover/4002_1001_1000:
Winter mountains are dangerous. They can
throw your life right off course, easy as that.
episode_event_naturelover/4002_1001_1100:
Hmm... I guess mountains and the ocean
have something in common.
episode_event_naturelover/4002_1001_1200:
They can be rough or calm, but they’re still
the same at their core. There are many ways
to see the same thing!
episode_event_naturelover/4002_1001_1300: Lately, I’ve been feeling less down...
episode_event_naturelover/4002_1001_1400:
And I’m actually starting to enjoy my life as
a Gym Leader.
episode_event_naturelover/4002_1001_1500: Like today—I’m open to trying new things.
episode_event_naturelover/4002_1001_1700: It’s cliché to compare life to a rough sea...
episode_event_naturelover/4002_1001_1800:
but you have the strength to not be swept
away! So don’t worry!
episode_event_naturelover/4002_1001_1900:
Thanks. I’ll try to have more confidence
in myself.
episode_event_naturelover/4002_1001_2000:
If you’re up for it, swing by again sometime
and catch some waves with us!
episode_event_naturelover/4002_1001_2100:
Someday your surfing talent will turn into
something huge, like a big wave.
episode_event_naturelover/4002_1001_2300:
Sure, maybe I’ll take you up on that and
stop by from time to time.
